title: Homepage Start Free Trial CTAs Navigation
description: Verify that all 'Start Free Trial' call-to-action buttons on the homepage navigate to the /login page in signup mode and do not lead directly to payment.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Click each visible 'Start Free Trial' button on desktop view
Check that each click redirects to the /login page in signup mode
Repeat clicks on all 'Start Free Trial' buttons in mobile viewport with sticky CTAs
Confirm all mobile sticky CTA buttons lead to /login page and no direct payment pages

title: Homepage Absence of Direct Payment Links
description: Ensure the homepage does not contain any direct links or buttons initiating Flutterwave payment flows outside of the upgrade process.

steps.description: Load the homepage
Verify absence of any payment buttons or links pointing directly to Flutterwave payment endpoints
Verify pricing cards display 'FREE TRIAL FIRST' badges and no payment action triggers

title: Authentication Flow - Email/Password Signup and Login Without Payment
description: Validate that new users can sign up and existing users can log in via email/password without any upfront payment requirements.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page from /login in signup mode
Fill in valid email and password fields and submit
New user account is created and user is redirected to dashboard
Logout, then navigate to login page
Enter valid registered credentials and login
User is successfully authenticated and redirected to dashboard
No payment prompt or requirement during signup or login

title: Authentication Flow - Google OAuth Login Without Payment
description: Verify users can authenticate using the Google OAuth flow and gain access to the dashboard without upfront payment.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on the Google login button
Authenticate with a valid Google account
User is logged in and redirected to dashboard
No payment screen is presented during or after login

title: Dashboard Accessibility During Free Trial
description: Confirm that trial users can fully access AI features and usage statistics on the dashboard before making any payment.

steps.description: Login as a user currently in free trial period
Navigate to dashboard main page
Dashboard loads successfully and displays accurate usage statistics
Access AI agent testing features from dashboard
AI agent testing functions operate without restriction during trial

title: Dashboard Sidebar 'Upgrade to Pro' Menu Item Presence and Styling
description: Verify the presence, visibility, and styling of the 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item in the dashboard sidebar, and that it links correctly to the upgrade page.

steps.description: Login and open the user dashboard
Locate the dashboard sidebar menu
Confirm the 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item is visible and styled with badges and gradient styled button or icon as per design
Click the 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item
User is navigated to /dashboard/upgrade page

title: Upgrade Page Load and Mobile Responsiveness Verification
description: Ensure the upgrade page loads successfully on desktop and mobile, displays all pricing plans, FAQs, and guarantee information clearly and accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to /dashboard/upgrade page on desktop
Page loads successfully without errors
Pricing cards for Starter ($300) and Pro ($500) plans are displayed with 'FREE TRIAL FIRST' badges and explanatory flow diagrams
Frequently asked questions and guarantee information are visible and correctly displayed
Resize browser or use device emulation to mobile viewport
Upgrade page layout adjusts properly and remains fully functional and readable

title: Payment Link Generation and Flutterwave Integration
description: Test that selecting a pricing plan on the upgrade page correctly initiates the Flutterwave payment process, generates valid payment links, and handles success and failure scenarios.

steps.description: On upgrade page, select the Starter plan and initiate payment
A valid payment link is generated and Flutterwave payment modal or page opens correctly
Complete payment in Flutterwave sandbox with successful transaction
User is redirected to success page and account setup begins within 48 hours
Repeat selection and payment initiation for Pro plan
Simulate payment failure or cancellation
User remains on upgrade page and appropriate error messaging is shown

title: Post-Payment User Setup and Live AI Deployment Timeline
description: Verify that after successful payment, user setup for live AI deployment is triggered and completed within the expected 48-hour SLA.

steps.description: Complete a successful payment via Flutterwave upgrade flow
Backend webhook is triggered and setup process starts
User record status updates to reflect paid subscription
Simulate or check system logs and user dashboard within 48 hours
Live AI deployment is confirmed available to the user

title: Navigation Consistency and Clarity Across Pages
description: Verify that navigation elements such as 'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' buttons appear distinctly and correctly on all relevant pages (homepage, login, dashboard) maintaining consistency and clarity.

steps.description: Load homepage and check visibility of 'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' buttons
'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' buttons are visually distinct and perform expected navigation
Navigate to login page
Both buttons remain visible and direct correctly to signup/login or dashboard
Within dashboard, check that navigation reflects user state and allows easy access to 'Upgrade to Pro' and logout

title: Error Handling for Authentication Failures
description: Confirm that invalid login attempts (incorrect credentials, unregistered email) are handled gracefully with user-friendly error messages, without revealing sensitive system information.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email format and submit
Error message indicating invalid email format is displayed
Input unregistered email and valid password, then submit
Error message indicates credentials invalid without specifying which field
Input registered email and wrong password, then submit
Error message indicates credentials invalid without revealing sensitive info

title: Error Handling for Payment Failures and Edge Cases
description: Validate that payment failures from Flutterwave (network issues, declined card, canceled payment) are gracefully handled with informative messages, and user remains on upgrade page without inconsistent state.

steps.description: Initiate Flutterwave payment for a selected plan
Simulate network failure during payment submission
User is informed of network error and payment is not processed
Simulate card declined status
User receives clear decline error message
User cancels the payment process before completion
User remains on upgrade page, no change in subscription status

title: Metrics Tracking and Conversion Rate Verification
description: Confirm that critical metrics for signups, dashboard usage, and trial-to-paid conversion rates are tracked accurately and reflect expected improvements after implementing the free trial flow.

steps.description: Perform multiple user signups through free trial CTAs
Simulate usage of dashboard AI features by trial users
Complete upgrades to paid plans by some users
Verify analytics data captures signups, feature usage, and conversions correctly in tracking system
Compare conversion rates pre- and post-implementation, confirming expected increase

title: Support Request Reduction for Trial and Payment Confusion
description: Verify that support tickets relating to confusion about free trial and payment requirements drop to zero after launch of new user flows.

steps.description: Review support ticket categorization data before feature rollout
Review support ticket categorization data weekly after rollout
Confirm support requests related to free trial presence and payment confusion reduce to zero

title: Application Build and Route Update Validation
description: Ensure the application builds successfully without errors and all new or updated routes (/login, /dashboard/upgrade, etc.) work correctly with the latest code changes.

steps.description: Run full application build process
Build completes without errors or warnings
Deploy application to a staging environment
Verify routing for homepage, /login, /signup, /dashboard, /dashboard/upgrade pages
All pages load successfully and present expected content
